diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

 package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
 
-import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;

+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.CloseableHttpClient;

     }

+                .setDefaultCookieStore(cookieStore)

+            }

-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));

+            clear.setEntity(new StringEntity("", StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
+            try (CloseableHttpResponse resp = client.execute(clear)) {
+            }
+        }
     }
 
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
+    }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727

+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}

+// Deprecated Spring controller; replaced with JAX-RS resource in CartResource.

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+            for (String title : List.of("Infinite Jest", "Bel Canto", "Kafka on the Shore")) {
+                HttpPost add = new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + urlEncode(title));
+                try (CloseableHttpResponse resp = client.execute(add)) {
+                }
+            }
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+            HttpGet get = new HttpGet(baseUrl + "/contents");
+            try (CloseableHttpResponse resp = client.execute(get)) {
+                InputStream is = resp.getEntity().getContent();
+                List<String> books = mapper.readValue(is, new TypeReference<List<String>>() {});
+                books.forEach(t -> System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + t));
+            }
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");

+            HttpDelete del = new HttpDelete(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + urlEncode("Gravity's Rainbow"));
+            try (CloseableHttpResponse resp = client.execute(del)) {
+            }
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+            HttpPost clear = new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/clear");
+            clear.setEntity(new StringEntity("", StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
+            try (CloseableHttpResponse resp = client.execute(clear)) {
+            }
+        }
     }
 
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

+// Deprecated Spring controller; replaced with JAX-RS resource in CartResource.

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+
diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/resources/META-INF/resources/index.html b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/resources/META-INF/resources/index.html
new file mode 100644

+            HttpPost clear = new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/clear");
+            clear.setEntity(new StringEntity("", StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
+            try (CloseableHttpResponse resp = client.execute(clear)) {
+            }
+        }
     }
 
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}

+// Deprecated Spring controller; replaced with JAX-RS resource in CartResource.

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");

+            System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+            HttpDelete del = new HttpDelete(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + urlEncode("Gravity's Rainbow"));
+            try (CloseableHttpResponse resp = client.execute(del)) {
+            }
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+            HttpPost clear = new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/clear");
+            clear.setEntity(new StringEntity("", StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
+            try (CloseableHttpResponse resp = client.execute(clear)) {
+            }
+        }
     }
 
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+
diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/resources/META-INF/resources/index.html b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/resources/META-INF/resources/index.html

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

+// Deprecated Spring controller; replaced with JAX-RS resource in CartResource.

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+
