+// Deprecated Spring controller; replaced with JAX-RS resource in CartResource.
+// This file remains to preserve package structure during migration and will be removed later.
diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

Plan update
Network is restricted; Quarkus BOM cannot be fetched. Adjusting plan to avoid external dependencies by removing Quarkus BOM/plugin and using only Jakarta REST API via Undertow within available dependencies. However, the Quarkus artifacts still need remote. We will keep structural changes but acknowledge build cannot resolve Quarkus without network.
  âœ“ Update parent and module POMs
  â†’ Refactor server to JAX-RS
  â€¢ Refactor service for session
  â€¢ Migrate client to Quarkus
  â€¢ Adjust configs/properties
  â€¢ Compile and validate
  â€¢ Write CHANGELOG.md
file update:
diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}

+// Deprecated Spring controller; replaced with JAX-RS resource in CartResource.

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+            clear.setEntity(new StringEntity("", StandardCharsets.UTF_8));

+            }
+        }
     }
 
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
+    }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

+// Deprecated Spring controller; replaced with JAX-RS resource in CartResource.

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

+// Deprecated Spring controller; replaced with JAX-RS resource in CartResource.
+// This file remains to preserve package structure during migration and will be removed later.
diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

+// Deprecated Spring controller; replaced with JAX-RS resource in CartResource.

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+            HttpGet get = new HttpGet(baseUrl + "/contents");
+            try (CloseableHttpResponse resp = client.execute(get)) {
+                InputStream is = resp.getEntity().getContent();
+                List<String> books = mapper.readValue(is, new TypeReference<List<String>>() {});
+                books.forEach(t -> System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + t));
+            }
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+            System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+            HttpDelete del = new HttpDelete(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + urlEncode("Gravity's Rainbow"));
+            try (CloseableHttpResponse resp = client.execute(del)) {
+            }
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+            HttpPost clear = new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/clear");
+            clear.setEntity(new StringEntity("", StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
+            try (CloseableHttpResponse resp = client.execute(clear)) {
+            }
+        }
     }
 
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

+// Deprecated Spring controller; replaced with JAX-RS resource in CartResource.

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

@@ -68,2 +61,21 @@
     }
+
+    private static List<String> parseJsonArray(String json) {
+        // Very basic JSON array of strings parser: ["a","b"] -> [a,b]
+        List<String> out = new ArrayList<>();
+        String trimmed = json.trim();
+        if (trimmed.startsWith("[") && trimmed.endsWith("]")) {
+            String inner = trimmed.substring(1, trimmed.length() - 1).trim();
+            if (!inner.isEmpty()) {
+                for (String part : inner.split(",")) {
+                    String s = part.trim();
+                    if (s.startsWith("\"") && s.endsWith("\"")) {
+                        s = s.substring(1, s.length() - 1);
+                    }
+                    out.add(s.replace("\\\"", "\""));
+                }
+            }
+        }
+        return out;
+    }
 }

--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727

+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+    public CartClient(String baseUrl) {

-        RestTemplate restTemplate = sessionTemplate.getRestTemplate();
+    public void doCartOperations() throws Exception {
+        HttpClient client = HttpClient.newBuilder().build();
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/initialize?person={person}&id={id}", null,
-                Void.class, "Duke d'Url", "123");
+        HttpRequest init = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/initialize?person=" + urlEncode("Duke d'Url") + "&id=123"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(init, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Infinite Jest");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class, "Bel Canto");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+        for (String title : List.of("Infinite Jest", "Bel Canto", "Kafka on the Shore")) {
+            HttpRequest add = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                    .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + urlEncode(title)))
+                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                    .build();
+            client.send(add, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+        }
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+        HttpRequest get = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/contents"))
+                .GET()
+                .build();
+        String body = client.send(get, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString()).body();
+        for (String t : parseJsonArray(body)) {
+            System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + t);
+        }
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+        HttpRequest del = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + urlEncode("Gravity's Rainbow")))
+                .DELETE()
+                .build();
+        client.send(del, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+        HttpRequest clear = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/clear"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(clear, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+    }
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
     }
 
+    private static List<String> parseJsonArray(String json) {
+        // Very basic JSON array of strings parser: ["a","b"] -> [a,b]
+        List<String> out = new ArrayList<>();
+        String trimmed = json.trim();
+        if (trimmed.startsWith("[") && trimmed.endsWith("]")) {
+            String inner = trimmed.substring(1, trimmed.length() - 1).trim();
+            if (!inner.isEmpty()) {
+                for (String part : inner.split(",")) {
+                    String s = part.trim();
+                    if (s.startsWith("\"") && s.endsWith("\"")) {
+                        s = s.substring(1, s.length() - 1);
+                    }
+                    out.add(s.replace("\\\"", "\""));
+                }
+            }
+        }
+        return out;
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+                    .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + urlEncode(title)))

+                    .build();
+            client.send(add, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());

-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(

-                HttpMethod.GET,

-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+        HttpRequest get = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/contents"))

+                .build();
+        String body = client.send(get, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString()).body();

-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");

+                .DELETE()
+                .build();
+        client.send(del, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");

+                .build();
+        client.send(clear, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());

-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
     }
 
+    private static List<String> parseJsonArray(String json) {
+        // Very basic JSON array of strings parser: ["a","b"] -> [a,b]
+        List<String> out = new ArrayList<>();
+        String trimmed = json.trim();
+        if (trimmed.startsWith("[") && trimmed.endsWith("]")) {
+            String inner = trimmed.substring(1, trimmed.length() - 1).trim();
+            if (!inner.isEmpty()) {
+                for (String part : inner.split(",")) {
+                    String s = part.trim();
+                    if (s.startsWith("\"") && s.endsWith("\"")) {
+                        s = s.substring(1, s.length() - 1);
+                    }
+                    out.add(s.replace("\\\"", "\""));
+                }
+            }
+        }
+        return out;
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

+// Deprecated Spring controller; replaced with JAX-RS resource in CartResource.

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+                    .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + urlEncode(title)))
+                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                    .build();
+            client.send(add, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+        }
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,

-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+        HttpRequest get = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/contents"))
+                .GET()
+                .build();
+        String body = client.send(get, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString()).body();
+        for (String t : parseJsonArray(body)) {
+            System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + t);

-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+        HttpRequest del = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + urlEncode("Gravity's Rainbow")))
+                .DELETE()
+                .build();
+        client.send(del, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+        HttpRequest clear = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/clear"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(clear, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+    }
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
     }
 
+    private static List<String> parseJsonArray(String json) {
+        // Very basic JSON array of strings parser: ["a","b"] -> [a,b]
+        List<String> out = new ArrayList<>();
+        String trimmed = json.trim();
+        if (trimmed.startsWith("[") && trimmed.endsWith("]")) {
+            String inner = trimmed.substring(1, trimmed.length() - 1).trim();
+            if (!inner.isEmpty()) {
+                for (String part : inner.split(",")) {
+                    String s = part.trim();
+                    if (s.startsWith("\"") && s.endsWith("\"")) {
+                        s = s.substring(1, s.length() - 1);
+                    }
+                    out.add(s.replace("\\\"", "\""));
+                }
+            }
+        }
+        return out;
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+

+// Deprecated Spring controller; replaced with JAX-RS resource in CartResource.

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+                    .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + urlEncode(title)))
+                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                    .build();
+            client.send(add, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+        }
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+        HttpRequest get = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/contents"))
+                .GET()
+                .build();
+        String body = client.send(get, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString()).body();
+        for (String t : parseJsonArray(body)) {
+            System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + t);
+        }
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+        HttpRequest del = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + urlEncode("Gravity's Rainbow")))
+                .DELETE()
+                .build();
+        client.send(del, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+        HttpRequest clear = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/clear"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(clear, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+    }
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
     }
 
+    private static List<String> parseJsonArray(String json) {
+        // Very basic JSON array of strings parser: ["a","b"] -> [a,b]
+        List<String> out = new ArrayList<>();
+        String trimmed = json.trim();
+        if (trimmed.startsWith("[") && trimmed.endsWith("]")) {
+            String inner = trimmed.substring(1, trimmed.length() - 1).trim();
+            if (!inner.isEmpty()) {
+                for (String part : inner.split(",")) {
+                    String s = part.trim();
+                    if (s.startsWith("\"") && s.endsWith("\"")) {
+                        s = s.substring(1, s.length() - 1);
+                    }
+                    out.add(s.replace("\\\"", "\""));
+                }
+            }
+        }
+        return out;
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+
+@Provider
+public class BookExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<BookException> {
+    @Override
+    public Response toResponse(BookException exception) {
+        return Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
+                .entity(exception.getMessage())
+                .build();
+    }
+}
+
