-    public CartClient(@Value("${app.cart.url}") String baseUrl) {
+    public CartClient(String baseUrl) {
         this.baseUrl = baseUrl;
     }
 
-    public void doCartOperations() {
-        SessionAwareRestTemplate sessionTemplate = new SessionAwareRestTemplate();
-        RestTemplate restTemplate = sessionTemplate.getRestTemplate();
+    public void doCartOperations() throws Exception {
+        HttpClient client = HttpClient.newBuilder().build();
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/initialize?person={person}&id={id}", null,
-                Void.class, "Duke d'Url", "123");
+        HttpRequest init = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/initialize?person=" + urlEncode("Duke d'Url") + "&id=123"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(init, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Infinite Jest");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class, "Bel Canto");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+        for (String title : List.of("Infinite Jest", "Bel Canto", "Kafka on the Shore")) {
+            HttpRequest add = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                    .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + urlEncode(title)))
+                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                    .build();
+            client.send(add, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+        }
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+        HttpRequest get = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/contents"))
+                .GET()
+                .build();
+        String body = client.send(get, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString()).body();
+        for (String t : parseJsonArray(body)) {
+            System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + t);
+        }
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+        HttpRequest del = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + urlEncode("Gravity's Rainbow")))
+                .DELETE()
+                .build();
+        client.send(del, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+        HttpRequest clear = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/clear"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(clear, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+    }
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
     }
 
+    private static List<String> parseJsonArray(String json) {
+        // Very basic JSON array of strings parser: ["a","b"] -> [a,b]
+        List<String> out = new ArrayList<>();
+        String trimmed = json.trim();
+        if (trimmed.startsWith("[") && trimmed.endsWith("]")) {
+            String inner = trimmed.substring(1, trimmed.length() - 1).trim();
+            if (!inner.isEmpty()) {
+                for (String part : inner.split(",")) {
+                    String s = part.trim();
+                    if (s.startsWith("\"") && s.endsWith("\"")) {
+                        s = s.substring(1, s.length() - 1);
+                    }
+                    out.add(s.replace("\\\"", "\""));
+                }
+            }
+        }
+        return out;
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+        for (String title : List.of("Infinite Jest", "Bel Canto", "Kafka on the Shore")) {

+                    .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + urlEncode(title)))
+                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                    .build();
+            client.send(add, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());

-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,

-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+        HttpRequest get = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/contents"))
+                .GET()
+                .build();
+        String body = client.send(get, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString()).body();
+        for (String t : parseJsonArray(body)) {
+            System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + t);
+        }
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+        HttpRequest del = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + urlEncode("Gravity's Rainbow")))
+                .DELETE()
+                .build();
+        client.send(del, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+        HttpRequest clear = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/clear"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(clear, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+    }
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
     }
 
+    private static List<String> parseJsonArray(String json) {
+        // Very basic JSON array of strings parser: ["a","b"] -> [a,b]
+        List<String> out = new ArrayList<>();
+        String trimmed = json.trim();
+        if (trimmed.startsWith("[") && trimmed.endsWith("]")) {
+            String inner = trimmed.substring(1, trimmed.length() - 1).trim();
+            if (!inner.isEmpty()) {
+                for (String part : inner.split(",")) {
+                    String s = part.trim();
+                    if (s.startsWith("\"") && s.endsWith("\"")) {
+                        s = s.substring(1, s.length() - 1);
+                    }
+                    out.add(s.replace("\\\"", "\""));
+                }
+            }
+        }
+        return out;
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..b6886f3796a2dae40562de291f074382ac211b36

+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

 package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
 
-import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;

-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+        for (String title : List.of("Infinite Jest", "Bel Canto", "Kafka on the Shore")) {

+                    .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + urlEncode(title)))
+                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                    .build();
+            client.send(add, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+        }
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+        HttpRequest get = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/contents"))
+                .GET()
+                .build();
+        String body = client.send(get, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString()).body();
+        for (String t : parseJsonArray(body)) {
+            System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + t);
+        }
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+        HttpRequest del = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + urlEncode("Gravity's Rainbow")))
+                .DELETE()
+                .build();
+        client.send(del, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+        HttpRequest clear = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/clear"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(clear, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+    }
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
     }
 
+    private static List<String> parseJsonArray(String json) {
+        // Very basic JSON array of strings parser: ["a","b"] -> [a,b]
+        List<String> out = new ArrayList<>();
+        String trimmed = json.trim();
+        if (trimmed.startsWith("[") && trimmed.endsWith("]")) {
+            String inner = trimmed.substring(1, trimmed.length() - 1).trim();
+            if (!inner.isEmpty()) {
+                for (String part : inner.split(",")) {
+                    String s = part.trim();
+                    if (s.startsWith("\"") && s.endsWith("\"")) {
+                        s = s.substring(1, s.length() - 1);
+                    }
+                    out.add(s.replace("\\\"", "\""));
+                }
+            }
+        }
+        return out;
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727

@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

 package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
 
-import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;

+    public void doCartOperations() throws Exception {

-                Void.class, "Duke d'Url", "123");
+        HttpRequest init = HttpRequest.newBuilder()

-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Infinite Jest");

-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+        for (String title : List.of("Infinite Jest", "Bel Canto", "Kafka on the Shore")) {
+            HttpRequest add = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                    .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + urlEncode(title)))
+                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                    .build();
+            client.send(add, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+        }
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+        HttpRequest get = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/contents"))
+                .GET()
+                .build();
+        String body = client.send(get, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString()).body();
+        for (String t : parseJsonArray(body)) {
+            System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + t);
+        }
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+        HttpRequest del = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + urlEncode("Gravity's Rainbow")))
+                .DELETE()
+                .build();
+        client.send(del, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+        HttpRequest clear = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/clear"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(clear, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+    }
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
     }
 
+    private static List<String> parseJsonArray(String json) {
+        // Very basic JSON array of strings parser: ["a","b"] -> [a,b]
+        List<String> out = new ArrayList<>();
+        String trimmed = json.trim();
+        if (trimmed.startsWith("[") && trimmed.endsWith("]")) {
+            String inner = trimmed.substring(1, trimmed.length() - 1).trim();
+            if (!inner.isEmpty()) {
+                for (String part : inner.split(",")) {
+                    String s = part.trim();
+                    if (s.startsWith("\"") && s.endsWith("\"")) {
+                        s = s.substring(1, s.length() - 1);
+                    }
+                    out.add(s.replace("\\\"", "\""));
+                }
+            }
+        }
+        return out;
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md

--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created `CHANGELOG.md` to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to parent `pom.xml`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- `cart-common/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`.
+- `cart-service/pom.xml`: removed `spring-context`; added CDI API for annotations.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- `cart-app/pom.xml`: added `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added `CartResource` JAX-RS resource and `BookExceptionMapper`.
+- Updated `application.properties` to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- `CartServiceImpl`: replaced Spring annotations with `@SessionScoped` and made class `Serializable`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot usage and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Apache HttpClient 5 with cookie store.
+- Added simple `Config` loader and set `Application` main class.
+- Updated `cart-appclient/pom.xml` for packaging and dependencies.
+

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

 package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
 
-import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;

-    public void doCartOperations() {
-        SessionAwareRestTemplate sessionTemplate = new SessionAwareRestTemplate();
-        RestTemplate restTemplate = sessionTemplate.getRestTemplate();
+    public void doCartOperations() throws Exception {
+        HttpClient client = HttpClient.newBuilder().build();
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/initialize?person={person}&id={id}", null,
-                Void.class, "Duke d'Url", "123");
+        HttpRequest init = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/initialize?person=" + urlEncode("Duke d'Url") + "&id=123"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(init, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Infinite Jest");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class, "Bel Canto");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+        for (String title : List.of("Infinite Jest", "Bel Canto", "Kafka on the Shore")) {
+            HttpRequest add = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                    .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + urlEncode(title)))
+                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                    .build();
+            client.send(add, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+        }
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+        HttpRequest get = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/contents"))
+                .GET()
+                .build();
+        String body = client.send(get, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString()).body();
+        for (String t : parseJsonArray(body)) {
+            System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + t);
+        }
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+        HttpRequest del = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + urlEncode("Gravity's Rainbow")))
+                .DELETE()
+                .build();
+        client.send(del, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+        HttpRequest clear = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/clear"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(clear, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+    }
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
     }
 
+    private static List<String> parseJsonArray(String json) {
+        // Very basic JSON array of strings parser: ["a","b"] -> [a,b]
+        List<String> out = new ArrayList<>();
+        String trimmed = json.trim();
+        if (trimmed.startsWith("[") && trimmed.endsWith("]")) {
+            String inner = trimmed.substring(1, trimmed.length() - 1).trim();
+            if (!inner.isEmpty()) {
+                for (String part : inner.split(",")) {
+                    String s = part.trim();
+                    if (s.startsWith("\"") && s.endsWith("\"")) {
+                        s = s.substring(1, s.length() - 1);
+                    }
+                    out.add(s.replace("\\\"", "\""));
+                }
+            }
+        }
+        return out;
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

+                    .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + urlEncode(title)))

+        HttpRequest get = HttpRequest.newBuilder()

-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");

-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");

+                .build();
+        client.send(clear, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());

-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
     }
 
+    private static List<String> parseJsonArray(String json) {
+        // Very basic JSON array of strings parser: ["a","b"] -> [a,b]
+        List<String> out = new ArrayList<>();
+        String trimmed = json.trim();
+        if (trimmed.startsWith("[") && trimmed.endsWith("]")) {
+            String inner = trimmed.substring(1, trimmed.length() - 1).trim();
+            if (!inner.isEmpty()) {
+                for (String part : inner.split(",")) {
+                    String s = part.trim();
+                    if (s.startsWith("\"") && s.endsWith("\"")) {
+                        s = s.substring(1, s.length() - 1);
+                    }
+                    out.add(s.replace("\\\"", "\""));
+                }
+            }
+        }
+        return out;
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}

+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:46:00Z] [info] Initialized migration log
+- Created CHANGELOG.md to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:47:10Z] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
+- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
+- Added io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin to parent pom.xml.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:48:20Z] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
+- cart-common/pom.xml: removed spring-context.
+- cart-service/pom.xml: removed spring-context; initially added CDI API.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:49:10Z] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
+- cart-app/pom.xml: added Quarkus REST dependencies (first pass), then minimized to avoid network builds.
+- Removed Spring Boot application class.
+- Added CartResource JAX-RS resource.
+- Updated application.properties to Quarkus HTTP config.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:50:05Z] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
+- CartServiceImpl: replaced Spring annotations with @SessionScoped and Serializable (first pass).
+- Later simplified back to plain class to avoid Quarkus CDI dependency in service module.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:51:30Z] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
+- Removed Spring Boot and RestTemplate.
+- Implemented client using Java 17 HttpClient, simple JSON parsing.
+- Added Config loader and updated Application main.
+- cart-appclient/pom.xml simplified to avoid network plugins.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:52:20Z] [error] Compilation failed: Quarkus BOM resolution blocked by network
+- Command: mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package
+- Details: Non-resolvable import POM io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom due to restricted network.
+- Action: Temporarily removed Quarkus deps in module POMs to try compile without them.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:53:05Z] [error] Compilation failed: Maven plugin resolution blocked by network
+- Command: mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package
+- Details: maven-clean-plugin could not be resolved from central; Unknown host.
+- Impact: Build cannot proceed without network to fetch standard Maven plugins.
+- Suggested Mitigation: Pre-populate local .m2repo with required plugin and dependency artifacts or enable network temporarily.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:54:00Z] [warning] Server module excluded from reactor to reduce failures
+- Parent pom excludes cart-app from modules to allow client/common/service code evolution.
+- Note: Full server build requires Quarkus artifacts; network access is needed.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:55:00Z] [info] Migration outcome under constraints
+- Code refactored to Quarkus-style where feasible.
+- Build blocked by network; compile verification deferred.

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

 package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
 
-import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;

-                Void.class, "Duke d'Url", "123");

-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+        for (String title : List.of("Infinite Jest", "Bel Canto", "Kafka on the Shore")) {
+            HttpRequest add = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                    .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + urlEncode(title)))
+                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                    .build();
+            client.send(add, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+        }
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+        HttpRequest get = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/contents"))
+                .GET()
+                .build();
+        String body = client.send(get, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString()).body();
+        for (String t : parseJsonArray(body)) {
+            System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + t);
+        }
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+        HttpRequest del = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + urlEncode("Gravity's Rainbow")))
+                .DELETE()
+                .build();
+        client.send(del, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+        HttpRequest clear = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/clear"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(clear, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+    }
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
     }
 
+    private static List<String> parseJsonArray(String json) {
+        // Very basic JSON array of strings parser: ["a","b"] -> [a,b]
+        List<String> out = new ArrayList<>();
+        String trimmed = json.trim();
+        if (trimmed.startsWith("[") && trimmed.endsWith("]")) {
+            String inner = trimmed.substring(1, trimmed.length() - 1).trim();
+            if (!inner.isEmpty()) {
+                for (String part : inner.split(",")) {
+                    String s = part.trim();
+                    if (s.startsWith("\"") && s.endsWith("\"")) {
+                        s = s.substring(1, s.length() - 1);
+                    }
+                    out.add(s.replace("\\\"", "\""));
+                }
+            }
+        }
+        return out;
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}
+

codex
**Migration Summary**

- Migrated multi-module Spring Boot app to a Quarkus-style structure.
- Replaced Spring MVC `@RestController` with JAX-RS-style resource (`CartResource`) and removed the Spring Boot application class.
- Converted service bean from Spring stereotypes to plain Java; originally moved toward CDI `@SessionScoped`, then simplified to avoid network-dependent Quarkus artifacts in the `service` module.
- Migrated the client module off Spring Boot and `RestTemplate`, using Java 17 `HttpClient` and a simple JSON array parser; added a light `Config` loader.
- Updated Maven parent POM to define Quarkus BOM and plugin management, acknowledging network restrictions prevented dependency resolution.

Due to restricted network access, Maven could not resolve the Quarkus BOM or even standard Maven plugins (e.g., `maven-clean-plugin`), so a complete compile was not possible within constraints. All actions, attempts, and results are logged in `CHANGELOG.md`.

**File Tree (modified/added/removed files)**

- Modified
  - pom.xml: Switched to Quarkus BOM/plugin management; adjusted modules sequencing during validation attempts; restored final Quarkus settings for clarity.
  - cart-common/pom.xml: Removed Spring dependency.
  - cart-service/pom.xml: Removed Spring dependency; briefly added Quarkus dependency then simplified to plain JAR.
  - cart-app/pom.xml: Replaced Spring Boot web dependency with Quarkus dependencies initially; then simplified due to network limits.
  - cart-app/src/main/resources/application.properties: Replaced Spring properties with Quarkus HTTP configuration.
  - cart-appclient/pom.xml: Removed Spring Boot; added simple configuration for plain Java client; removed plugin requiring network.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/Application.java: Rewrote to plain `main` entry point.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartClient.java: Replaced Spring client with Java 17 `HttpClient`.
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartController.java: Replaced content with a stub to indicate deprecation (superseded by `CartResource`).
  - cart-service/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/service/CartServiceImpl.java: Removed Spring annotations; moved toward CDI then simplified to plain class.
  - CHANGELOG.md: Added detailed, timestamped logs for all steps.
- Added
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java: JAX-RS-style resource for cart operations.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/Config.java: Loads `application.properties` for client URL.
  - cart-app/src/main/resources/META-INF/resources/index.html: Basic index page.
- Removed
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/Application.java: Removed Spring Boot app entry.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/SessionAwareRestTemplate.java: Removed Spring HTTP client.
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/BookExceptionMapper.java: Removed when simplifying server module due to network constraints.

**Step-by-Step Log**

- 2025-11-27T00:46:00Z [info] Initialized CHANGELOG and started migration.
- 2025-11-27T00:47:10Z [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and added `quarkus-maven-plugin`.
- 2025-11-27T00:48:20Z [info] Removed Spring dependencies from `cart-common` and `cart-service`.
- 2025-11-27T00:49:10Z [info] Migrated server endpoints to JAX-RS-style `CartResource`; replaced Spring application properties with Quarkus HTTP configuration.
- 2025-11-27T00:50:05Z [info] Converted `CartServiceImpl` from Spring stereotypes to CDI `@SessionScoped` and then simplified to a plain class for compilation independence.
- 2025-11-27T00:51:30Z [info] Migrated client from Spring Boot/RestTemplate to Java 17 `HttpClient`; added `Config` loader.
- 2025-11-27T00:52:20Z [error] Maven failed resolving Quarkus BOM due to network restrictions.
- 2025-11-27T00:53:05Z [error] Maven failed resolving `maven-clean-plugin` due to network restrictions.
- 2025-11-27T00:54:00Z [warning] Temporarily adjusted modules and dependencies to reduce resolution scope; full Quarkus server build still requires network.
- 2025-11-27T00:55:00Z [info] Finalized migration with detailed documentation of constraints.

**CHANGELOG.md Contents**

```markdown
# Migration Changelog

## [2025-11-27T00:46:00Z] [info] Initialized migration log
- Created CHANGELOG.md to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.

## [2025-11-27T00:47:10Z] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
- Added io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin to parent pom.xml.

## [2025-11-27T00:48:20Z] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
- cart-common/pom.xml: removed spring-context.
- cart-service/pom.xml: removed spring-context; initially added CDI API.

## [2025-11-27T00:49:10Z] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
- cart-app/pom.xml: added Quarkus REST dependencies (first pass), then minimized to avoid network builds.
- Removed Spring Boot application class.
- Added CartResource JAX-RS resource.
- Updated application.properties to Quarkus HTTP config.

## [2025-11-27T00:50:05Z] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
- CartServiceImpl: replaced Spring annotations with @SessionScoped and Serializable (first pass).
- Later simplified back to plain class to avoid Quarkus CDI dependency in service module.

## [2025-11-27T00:51:30Z] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
- Removed Spring Boot and RestTemplate.
- Implemented client using Java 17 HttpClient, simple JSON parsing.
- Added Config loader and updated Application main.
- cart-appclient/pom.xml simplified to avoid network plugins.

## [2025-11-27T00:52:20Z] [error] Compilation failed: Quarkus BOM resolution blocked by network
- Command: mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package
- Details: Non-resolvable import POM io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom due to restricted network.
- Action: Temporarily removed Quarkus deps in module POMs to try compile without them.

## [2025-11-27T00:53:05Z] [error] Compilation failed: Maven plugin resolution blocked by network
- Command: mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package
- Details: maven-clean-plugin could not be resolved from central; Unknown host.
- Impact: Build cannot proceed without network to fetch standard Maven plugins.
- Suggested Mitigation: Pre-populate local .m2repo with required plugin and dependency artifacts or enable network temporarily.

## [2025-11-27T00:54:00Z] [warning] Server module excluded from reactor to reduce failures
- Parent pom excludes cart-app from modules to allow client/common/service code evolution.
- Note: Full server build requires Quarkus artifacts; network access is needed.

## [2025-11-27T00:55:00Z] [info] Migration outcome under constraints
- Code refactored to Quarkus-style where feasible.
- Build blocked by network; compile verification deferred.
```

**Error Handling**

- Error: Non-resolvable import POM for `io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom`.
  - Impact: Cannot resolve Quarkus dependencies without network.
  - Mitigation: Enable network or provide a pre-populated local Maven repository `.m2repo` with required Quarkus artifacts.

- Error: Maven plugin resolution failure for `maven-clean-plugin`.
  - Impact: Standard Maven lifecycle cannot execute without downloaded plugins.
  - Mitigation: Pre-populate `.m2repo` with plugin artifacts or temporarily enable network to download standard plugins.

- Partial refactor limitations:
  - `CartResource` and Quarkus server dependencies remain conceptually correct, but building the server module requires Quarkus artifacts which the environment cannot fetch. Suggested action: with network access, restore Quarkus dependencies in `cart-app/pom.xml`:
    - `io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy`
    - `io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-jackson`
    - optional servlet/web: `io.quarkus:quarkus-undertow` or use Quarkus web defaults.
  - Mark `CartServiceImpl` as `@SessionScoped` for HTTP session-scoped CDI once Quarkus CDI (`quarkus-arc`) is available.

If you want, I can:
- Re-enable the server module with Quarkus dependencies and prepare a ready-to-build POM, assuming network will be available at build time.
- Add a simple script to bootstrap `.m2repo` from a cache, if you provide it.

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..2a79d5abd324dd577cb8f621ae618e6a9d087727

+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_2/cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.RequestScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
+import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.BookException;
+import spring.examples.tutorial.cart.common.Cart;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+@Path("/cart")
+@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
+@RequestScoped
+public class CartResource {
+
+    @Inject
+    Cart cart;
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public Response initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                               @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
+        if (id == null || id.isEmpty()) {
+            cart.initialize(person);
+        } else {
+            cart.initialize(person, id);
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public Response addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
+        cart.addBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public Response removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+        cart.removeBook(title);
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
+    public List<String> getContents() {
+        return cart.getContents();
+    }
+
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public Response checkout(@Context HttpSession session) {
+        cart.remove();
+        if (session != null) {
+            session.invalidate();
+        }
+        return Response.noContent().build();
+    }
+}
+

new file mode 100644

+</head>

+</body>
+</html>

+    public CartClient(String baseUrl) {

     }
 
-    public void doCartOperations() {
-        SessionAwareRestTemplate sessionTemplate = new SessionAwareRestTemplate();
-        RestTemplate restTemplate = sessionTemplate.getRestTemplate();
+    public void doCartOperations() throws Exception {
+        HttpClient client = HttpClient.newBuilder().build();
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/initialize?person={person}&id={id}", null,
-                Void.class, "Duke d'Url", "123");
+        HttpRequest init = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/initialize?person=" + urlEncode("Duke d'Url") + "&id=123"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(init, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Infinite Jest");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class, "Bel Canto");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+        for (String title : List.of("Infinite Jest", "Bel Canto", "Kafka on the Shore")) {
+            HttpRequest add = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                    .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + urlEncode(title)))
+                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                    .build();
+            client.send(add, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+        }
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+        HttpRequest get = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/contents"))
+                .GET()
+                .build();
+        String body = client.send(get, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString()).body();
+        for (String t : parseJsonArray(body)) {
+            System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + t);
+        }
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+        HttpRequest del = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + urlEncode("Gravity's Rainbow")))
+                .DELETE()
+                .build();
+        client.send(del, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+        HttpRequest clear = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
+                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + "/clear"))
+                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody())
+                .build();
+        client.send(clear, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.discarding());
+    }
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+    private static String urlEncode(String s) {
+        return java.net.URLEncoder.encode(s, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
     }
 
+    private static List<String> parseJsonArray(String json) {
+        // Very basic JSON array of strings parser: ["a","b"] -> [a,b]
+        List<String> out = new ArrayList<>();
+        String trimmed = json.trim();
+        if (trimmed.startsWith("[") && trimmed.endsWith("]")) {
+            String inner = trimmed.substring(1, trimmed.length() - 1).trim();
+            if (!inner.isEmpty()) {
+                for (String part : inner.split(",")) {
+                    String s = part.trim();
+                    if (s.startsWith("\"") && s.endsWith("\"")) {
+                        s = s.substring(1, s.length() - 1);
+                    }
+                    out.add(s.replace("\\\"", "\""));
+                }
+            }
+        }
+        return out;
+    }
 }

+package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+import java.util.Properties;
+
+public class Config {
+    private static final Properties props = new Properties();
+    static {
+        try (InputStream is = Config.class.getClassLoader()
+                .getResourceAsStream("application.properties")) {
+            if (is != null) {
+                props.load(is);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            // ignore
+        }
+    }
+    public static String get(String key) {
+        return props.getProperty(key);
+    }
+}

**Migration Summary**

- Migrated multi-module Spring Boot app to a Quarkus-style structure.
- Replaced Spring MVC `@RestController` with JAX-RS-style resource (`CartResource`) and removed the Spring Boot application class.
- Converted service bean from Spring stereotypes to plain Java; originally moved toward CDI `@SessionScoped`, then simplified to avoid network-dependent Quarkus artifacts in the `service` module.
- Migrated the client module off Spring Boot and `RestTemplate`, using Java 17 `HttpClient` and a simple JSON array parser; added a light `Config` loader.
- Updated Maven parent POM to define Quarkus BOM and plugin management, acknowledging network restrictions prevented dependency resolution.

Due to restricted network access, Maven could not resolve the Quarkus BOM or even standard Maven plugins (e.g., `maven-clean-plugin`), so a complete compile was not possible within constraints. All actions, attempts, and results are logged in `CHANGELOG.md`.

**File Tree (modified/added/removed files)**

- Modified
  - pom.xml: Switched to Quarkus BOM/plugin management; adjusted modules sequencing during validation attempts; restored final Quarkus settings for clarity.
  - cart-common/pom.xml: Removed Spring dependency.
  - cart-service/pom.xml: Removed Spring dependency; briefly added Quarkus dependency then simplified to plain JAR.
  - cart-app/pom.xml: Replaced Spring Boot web dependency with Quarkus dependencies initially; then simplified due to network limits.
  - cart-app/src/main/resources/application.properties: Replaced Spring properties with Quarkus HTTP configuration.
  - cart-appclient/pom.xml: Removed Spring Boot; added simple configuration for plain Java client; removed plugin requiring network.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/Application.java: Rewrote to plain `main` entry point.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartClient.java: Replaced Spring client with Java 17 `HttpClient`.
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartController.java: Replaced content with a stub to indicate deprecation (superseded by `CartResource`).
  - cart-service/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/service/CartServiceImpl.java: Removed Spring annotations; moved toward CDI then simplified to plain class.
  - CHANGELOG.md: Added detailed, timestamped logs for all steps.
- Added
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartResource.java: JAX-RS-style resource for cart operations.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/Config.java: Loads `application.properties` for client URL.
  - cart-app/src/main/resources/META-INF/resources/index.html: Basic index page.
- Removed
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/Application.java: Removed Spring Boot app entry.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/SessionAwareRestTemplate.java: Removed Spring HTTP client.
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/BookExceptionMapper.java: Removed when simplifying server module due to network constraints.

**Step-by-Step Log**

- 2025-11-27T00:46:00Z [info] Initialized CHANGELOG and started migration.
- 2025-11-27T00:47:10Z [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and added `quarkus-maven-plugin`.
- 2025-11-27T00:48:20Z [info] Removed Spring dependencies from `cart-common` and `cart-service`.
- 2025-11-27T00:49:10Z [info] Migrated server endpoints to JAX-RS-style `CartResource`; replaced Spring application properties with Quarkus HTTP configuration.
- 2025-11-27T00:50:05Z [info] Converted `CartServiceImpl` from Spring stereotypes to CDI `@SessionScoped` and then simplified to a plain class for compilation independence.
- 2025-11-27T00:51:30Z [info] Migrated client from Spring Boot/RestTemplate to Java 17 `HttpClient`; added `Config` loader.
- 2025-11-27T00:52:20Z [error] Maven failed resolving Quarkus BOM due to network restrictions.
- 2025-11-27T00:53:05Z [error] Maven failed resolving `maven-clean-plugin` due to network restrictions.
- 2025-11-27T00:54:00Z [warning] Temporarily adjusted modules and dependencies to reduce resolution scope; full Quarkus server build still requires network.
- 2025-11-27T00:55:00Z [info] Finalized migration with detailed documentation of constraints.

**CHANGELOG.md Contents**

```markdown
# Migration Changelog

## [2025-11-27T00:46:00Z] [info] Initialized migration log
- Created CHANGELOG.md to track Spring to Quarkus migration steps.

## [2025-11-27T00:47:10Z] [info] Updated parent POM to Quarkus BOM and plugin
- Replaced Spring Boot dependency management with Quarkus BOM.
- Added io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin to parent pom.xml.

## [2025-11-27T00:48:20Z] [info] Removed Spring dependencies from common and service POMs
- cart-common/pom.xml: removed spring-context.
- cart-service/pom.xml: removed spring-context; initially added CDI API.

## [2025-11-27T00:49:10Z] [info] Migrated server module to Quarkus JAX-RS
- cart-app/pom.xml: added Quarkus REST dependencies (first pass), then minimized to avoid network builds.
- Removed Spring Boot application class.
- Added CartResource JAX-RS resource.
- Updated application.properties to Quarkus HTTP config.

## [2025-11-27T00:50:05Z] [info] Updated service bean to CDI session scope
- CartServiceImpl: replaced Spring annotations with @SessionScoped and Serializable (first pass).
- Later simplified back to plain class to avoid Quarkus CDI dependency in service module.

## [2025-11-27T00:51:30Z] [info] Migrated client module off Spring
- Removed Spring Boot and RestTemplate.
- Implemented client using Java 17 HttpClient, simple JSON parsing.
- Added Config loader and updated Application main.
- cart-appclient/pom.xml simplified to avoid network plugins.

## [2025-11-27T00:52:20Z] [error] Compilation failed: Quarkus BOM resolution blocked by network
- Command: mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package
- Details: Non-resolvable import POM io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom due to restricted network.
- Action: Temporarily removed Quarkus deps in module POMs to try compile without them.

## [2025-11-27T00:53:05Z] [error] Compilation failed: Maven plugin resolution blocked by network
- Command: mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package
- Details: maven-clean-plugin could not be resolved from central; Unknown host.
- Impact: Build cannot proceed without network to fetch standard Maven plugins.
- Suggested Mitigation: Pre-populate local .m2repo with required plugin and dependency artifacts or enable network temporarily.

## [2025-11-27T00:54:00Z] [warning] Server module excluded from reactor to reduce failures
- Parent pom excludes cart-app from modules to allow client/common/service code evolution.
- Note: Full server build requires Quarkus artifacts; network access is needed.

## [2025-11-27T00:55:00Z] [info] Migration outcome under constraints
- Code refactored to Quarkus-style where feasible.
- Build blocked by network; compile verification deferred.
```

**Error Handling**

- Error: Non-resolvable import POM for `io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom`.
  - Impact: Cannot resolve Quarkus dependencies without network.
  - Mitigation: Enable network or provide a pre-populated local Maven repository `.m2repo` with required Quarkus artifacts.

- Error: Maven plugin resolution failure for `maven-clean-plugin`.
  - Impact: Standard Maven lifecycle cannot execute without downloaded plugins.
  - Mitigation: Pre-populate `.m2repo` with plugin artifacts or temporarily enable network to download standard plugins.

- Partial refactor limitations:
  - `CartResource` and Quarkus server dependencies remain conceptually correct, but building the server module requires Quarkus artifacts which the environment cannot fetch. Suggested action: with network access, restore Quarkus dependencies in `cart-app/pom.xml`:
    - `io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy`
    - `io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-jackson`
    - optional servlet/web: `io.quarkus:quarkus-undertow` or use Quarkus web defaults.
  - Mark `CartServiceImpl` as `@SessionScoped` for HTTP session-scoped CDI once Quarkus CDI (`quarkus-arc`) is available.

If you want, I can:
- Re-enable the server module with Quarkus dependencies and prepare a ready-to-build POM, assuming network will be available at build time.
- Add a simple script to bootstrap `.m2repo` from a cache, if you provide it.
